lines.text: Do you need a lot of money?
Everybody needs a lot of money.
I hit golf balls, Carol. That's how I make my living.
Having your own private police force isn't as chic as having your own private army, but that's the price we pay for living in a Democracy.
Almost as much as you do. You better not go near any reflecting pools - you're liable to fall in and drown.
You get it. You're a big, strong man.

Son, you're talking about cause and effect in the outside world. But we're not living in the outside world. We're living on Mount Olympus. And there's only one god and one demi-god - Mr Pallister Young and Mr Jonathan Linus... and they pick the music... and the rest of us just run around, half men and half goats. And that's the long and the short of it.
